---
title: "Support Model"
---

The Modern Data Platform was designed by AxeTech to be owned by the customer and hosted in their own cloud environment.

As AT-MDP is scalable and flexible it can be used in a variety of support models.  The most common configuraiton is outlined below.

| Role                    | Entity   |
|:------------------------|:---------|
|Design and build         |AxeTech   |
|Installation             |AxeTech   |
|Cloud hosting            |Customer  |
|Backup                   |Customer  |
|Support and maintenance  |Customer  |
|Data analyts             |Customer  |

Customers can request an alternative support model as part of the initial engagement process.
